question: What is the theme of the World Telecommunication and Information Society Day celebrated on May 17, 2020?
option1: Connect 2030: ICTs for the Sustainable Development Goals (SDGs)
option2: Information and Communication embracing the world
answer: Connect 2030: ICTs for the Sustainable Development Goals (SDGs)
explanation:
The World Telecommunication and Information Society Day has been celebrated on May 17, every year across the world. This year the theme is “Connect 2030: ICTs for the Sustainable Development Goals (SDGs)”
The objective of World Telecommunication and Information Society Day (WTISD) is to raise awareness of the usage of Internet and other information and communication technologies (ICT) in bridging the digital divide. May 17 also marks the anniversary of the signing of the first International Telegraph Convention and the creation of the International Telecommunication Union (ITU).
